response.overview: Rashid lost his job as a fishing boat captain. Consequently, the man became unemployed. And this is not all, as his wife, Souad, is also threatened with losing her job in one of the textile factories, after successive waves of strikes in the institution. Consequently, financial problems began to surround Rashid and Souad’s family from all sides. In the wake of this, new family problems will appear, which will be added to the financial problems. Despite this, Rashid will cling to hope, waiting for relief.
response.title: النوارس
